resources.string: Please enter an abbreviation.
Please enter an additional cost value.
Please enter how many hits/round of bleeding.
Please enter the penalty for the breakage roll.
Please select a body part.
Please enter a code.
Please enter the number of rounds the defender is dazed.
Please enter a default movement rate.
Please enter a description.
Please enter the amount of fatigue penalty.
Please enter the percent the defender is grappled.
Please enter the number of additional hit point damage done.
Please enter an initial cost value.
Please enter the amount of injury penalty.
Please enter the distance in feet that the defender is knocked back.
Minimum roll value cannot be greater than maximum roll value.
Please enter a minimum roll value.
Maximum roll value cannot be less than minimum roll value.
Please enter a maximum roll value.
Please enter a name.
Please enter the number of rounds the defender is unable to parry.
Please enter a severity code.
Please enter the number of rounds the defender is stunned.
Please enter a value.
Please enter a weight value.
